data.question: What does the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader allow users to do?
data.answer: The ComfyUI-CSV-Loader allows users to access positive/negative prompts associated with a name from CSV files within the ComfyUI interface for prompt building.
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: How do I install the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader?
data.answer: To install the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader, unzip the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader.zip file and place it into the custom_nodes folder within your ComfyUI installation, without changing the naming.
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: What file can I use to test the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader nodes?
data.answer: You can use the ComyUI_Simple_Workflow.png file found in the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader folder to test the nodes or add them to your current workflow.
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: Where is the folder with the CSV files located within the ComfyUI installation?
data.answer: The folder with the CSV files is located in ComfyUI\custom_nodes\ComfyUI-CSV_Loader\CSV to keep everything contained.
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: Which CSV files are included in the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader?
data.answer: The included CSV files are artists.csv, artmovements.csv, characters.csv, composition.csv, lighting.csv, negative.csv, positive.csv, settings.csv, and styles.csv.
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: Can I update the selections in the CSV files?
data.answer: Yes, the CSV files included with the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader can be updated with additional content at any time.
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: Where can I find more information about the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader workflow?
data.answer: More information about the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader workflow can be found at the following link: https://comfyworkflows.com/?workflow_id=320ac429-28cd-4192-a7c3-da1ed3fd1893
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: Who is the author of the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader?
data.answer: The author of the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader is PCMonsterx.
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader

data.question: Where can I find the source code for the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader?
data.answer: The source code for the ComfyUI-CSV-Loader can be found on GitHub at the following link: https://github.com/PCMonsterx/ComfyUI-CSV-Loader
data.subject: ComfyUI-CSV-Loader
